rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现早产儿的人乳强化剂与牛奶强化剂没有显着的结果差异研究比较了用母乳强化剂 (HMBF) 或牛奶强化剂 (BMBF) 喂养极早产儿的效果，发现坏死性小肠结肠炎、败血症或死亡的发生率没有显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Human-vs-cows-milk-fortifier-in-preterm-infants-No-significant-outcome-difference-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Human-vs-cows-milk-fortifier-in-preterm-infants-No-significant-outcome-difference-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9c19f9b-0fa1-4c0f-83b0-548ff427b291 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 20:09:00 -0500 Human vs. cow's milk fortifier in preterm infants: No significant outcome difference, study finds
东部马脑炎病毒研究发现了可预防致命脑部感染的诱饵分子对东方马脑炎病毒如何与关键受体结合并进入细胞内部的原子水平研究也使得发现了一种诱饵分子，可以防止小鼠体内可能致命的脑部感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Eastern-equine-encephalitis-virus-study-uncovers-decoy-molecule-that-protects-against-deadly-brain-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Eastern-equine-encephalitis-virus-study-uncovers-decoy-molecule-that-protects-against-deadly-brain-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9790e3-faca-4531-ac3b-2d4a68ad9741 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:40:50 -0500 Eastern equine encephalitis virus study uncovers decoy molecule that protects against deadly brain infection
研究绘制了衰老过程中 IgG 糖基化复杂过程的基因网络一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 24 期，题为“Mapping of thegene Network that Regulate Gans”衰老时钟。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Study-maps-gene-network-orchestrating-complex-process-of-IgG-glycosylation-in-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Study-maps-gene-network-orchestrating-complex-process-of-IgG-glycosylation-in-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1ecbb03-b9e3-4d58-ba36-8874461e382e Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:34:13 -0500 Study maps gene network orchestrating complex process of IgG glycosylation in aging
德州大学西南医学中心发现了一种预防糖尿病患者心力衰竭的两步筛查方法德克萨斯大学西南医学中心研究人员领导的一项研究表明，将临床风险评估与生物标志物测试相结合的两步筛查方案可以更有效地识别哪些 2 型糖尿病患者需要药物来预防心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/UT-Southwestern-discovers-a-two-step-screening-for-heart-failure-prevention-in-病人-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/UT-Southwestern-discovers-a-two-step-screening-for-heart-failure-prevention-in-病人-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a7fe1a8-c177-4f00-909d-e321ffadfdb6 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:27:26 -0500 UT Southwestern discovers a two-step screening for heart failure prevention in patients with diabetes
MGH 研究确定了与妊娠高血压疾病相关的关键蛋白质先兆子痫和其他妊娠高血压疾病的特征是妊娠后半期出现高血压，伴或不伴器官功能障碍，给母亲和孩子带来相当大的短期和长期风险。治疗选择（除加急分娩外）仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/MGH-study-identizes-key- Proteins-linked-to-pregnancy-hypertension-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/MGH-study-identizes-key- Proteins-linked-to-pregnancy-hypertension-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3070467-f255-414b-a174-0487612129fb Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:15:40 -0500 MGH study identifies key proteins linked to pregnancy hypertension disorders
新的偏头痛诊断使老年人的车祸风险增加三倍科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，最近被诊断出患有偏头痛的老年驾驶员发生车祸的可能性是其他人的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-migraine-diagnosis-triples-crash-risk-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-migraine-diagnosis-triples-crash-risk-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49678bf4-c74f-4e94-8f37-9ac859491087 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:01:47 -0500 New migraine diagnosis triples crash risk for older adults
研究人员制定了第一个神经胶质瘤标准化成像国际标准弥漫性神经胶质瘤是恶性脑肿瘤，无法通过使用 MRI 的传统成像进行最佳检查。氨基酸 PET 可以更好地可视化神经胶质瘤的活动和扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Researchers-built-the-first-international-criteria-for-standardized-imaging-of-gliomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Researchers-built-the-first-international-criteria-for-standardized-imaging-of-gliomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=262a9d9c-7433-4aee-b6e9-432213bfdc97 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:51:19 -0500 Researchers establish the first international criteria for standardized imaging of gliomas
稀有免疫细胞是预测黑色素瘤治疗成功的关键伦敦国王学院、盖伊和圣托马斯医院信托基金以及弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员发现，一种免疫细胞可以帮助预测哪些患者可能从癌症免疫疗法中获益最多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Rare-immune-cell-holds-key-to-predicting-melanoma-treatment-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Rare-immune-cell-holds-key-to-predicting-melanoma-treatment-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2056c5b4-72eb-468e-a782-28931fb5fd00 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:37:05 -0500 Rare immune cell holds key to predicting melanoma treatment success
人工智能生成的图像有望改变医疗诊断如今诊断癌症需要使用化学“造影剂”来提高 X 射线以及计算机断层扫描 (CT) 和磁共振成像 (MRI) 扫描等医学成像过程的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/AI- generated-images-promise-to-transform-medical-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/AI- generated-images-promise-to-transform-medical-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4db12ea-fb03-4da9-b10e-87845fcbab79 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:21:16 -0500 AI-generated images promise to transform medical diagnostics
耶鲁大学科学家发现可缓解骨关节炎关节退化的药物靶点耶鲁大学的研究人员已经确定了一种药物靶标，可以减轻与骨关节炎相关的关节退化，骨关节炎是一种使人衰弱的疾病，仅在美国就有多达 3000 万人受到影响，他们于 1 月 3 日在《自然》杂志上报道了这一情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Yale-scientists-identify-drug-target-that-may-alleviate-joint-degenesis-in-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Yale-scientists-identify-drug-target-that-may-alleviate-joint-degenesis-in-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e82ad503-e533-406b-ad0f-960c605418bf Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:13:46 -0500 Yale scientists identify drug target that may alleviate joint degeneration in osteoarthritis
